General.Name: Zhengzhou Yutong Bus Co Ltd
General.Description: Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sales of bus products in China. It offers e-buses, e-coaches, city buses, coaches, airfield buses, and special vehicles. The company is also involved in the import and export trade business; production and sale of auto parts and air conditioners; provision of car, taxi, and bus passenger transport services, as well as warehousing and rental services; sale of automotive and accessories; real estate development and management; technology development, consultation, and service; and development and sale of software. The company was formerly known as Zhengzhou Yutong Bus Co., Ltd. Yutong Bus Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.
